# Visions of the Future (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 16]]

**Components:** V, S

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 128

*You view events slightly before they happen, gaining time to react to them.*

You gain a +2 sacred bonus on all saving throws and +2 dodge bonus to Armor Class. Once during the spellâ€™s duration, as an immediate action, you can choose to discharge the spell to gain a greater bonus. When you discharge the spell in this manner, you gain a sacred bonus on all saving throws and a dodge bonus to your Armor Class equal to 1/2 your caster level (maximum +25). This bonus lasts until the beginning of your next turn.
